name: Project Chaos
description:
Based in claustrophobic small maps, with reactive and fast paced movement, PROJECT CHAOS boasts a lack of lengthy death timers, transporting you back into the fight instantly, keeping the momentum of the game rolling.

Deaths and kills are not recorded and displayed, in favour of a score based system, where bonuses and also detriments can increase or decrease the score. With the goal of the game to obtain the highest score as either a team or a solo player.


Jump into chaotic battles with Project Chaos signature mode: Chaos. Where with each life you spawn with a completely different loadout. Use the constant changes to learn new weapons, experiment with different playstyles or just enjoy the bonkers mess the gamemode produces.

Or for the more classic players, jump into the normal Team Death Match and Free For All gamemodes, where you can use your pre-set loadout in an attempt to cause as much chaos as physically possible.


You can only cause so much chaos with a stick, so Project Chaos only the provides the most powerful weapons for players to wield.
With options like:
  • Smart Rocket Launchers,
  • .50 Cal Snipers,
  • Miniguns,
  • Lightning SMG’s,
  • Full Auto Incendiary Shotguns,
  • and much more make up the in game arsenal.
